info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:55PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bladen and east central Robeson Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 454 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms from St Pauls to Elizabethtown, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elizabethtown, Smiths, Howellsville, Bladen Community College, Tolarsville, Duart, Tobermory, Ruskin, White Oak, Jerome, Dublin, Tar Heel and Bladen County Hospital. This includes Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 24 and 28. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
